title: Actions for the Protection of the Collective Interests of Consumers Act 2023

text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Representative Actions for the 
Interests of Consumers Act 2023 

the Collective 

Protection of 
(Commencement) Order 2024.

title: Actions for the Protection of the Collective Interests of Consumers Act 2023
heading: 2. The 30th day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Representative Actions for the Protection of the Collective Interests of 
Consumers Act 2023 (No. 22 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [181] 3
